page.title: 070IL WORKER'S FAMILY 2
page.content: (until) quarter to twelve.When my dad heard about it he said I was'nt to go to another disco.But a few days later he let me go to another one.The only reason was because I recorded a war film about Vietnam called "Apocolypse Now"for him. I suppose he gets a lot of money for what he does but thats none of my buisness so I don't ask. However we eat quite well and we have a lot of videos so he must get a lot. We eat mostly Chinese food or steaks because thats what we have always liked. My mum doesn't really mind him being away but she does miss him.
